LanguageData.RawChanterelle.label: chanterelle
LanguageData.RawChanterelle.description: Raw protein-rich chanterelles, can be used as meat substitute. Nice to eat, even when raw.

LanguageData.RawParasolMushroom.description: Raw protein-rich proud mountain-shroom, can be used as meat substitute. Nice to eat, even when raw.
